Discorporate Retaliation.name: Discorporate Retaliation
Discorporate Retaliation.flavor: Your body responds to attack by slipping the bonds of the material world, then unleashing a vicious psychic counterstrike.
Discorporate Retaliation.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Discorporate Retaliation.effect: You are insubstantial until the end of the triggering attacker’s turn.
Discorporate Retaliation.attack:
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 6 vs. Will
Level 21: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma + 9 vs. Will
Discorporate Retaliation.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier, Wisdom modifier, or Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Discorporate Retaliation.special: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.

Hidden Reserves.name: Hidden Reserves
Hidden Reserves.flavor: You draw psionic energy from your body to power a single devastating attack.
Hidden Reserves.effect: Make an attack using an augmentable at-will power. You can use any of the power’s augmentations without spending power points, and the power deals 5 extra psychic damage and deals half damage on a miss.

Elan Recovery.name: Elan Recovery
Elan Recovery.flavor: You focus mind and body to better shake off the afflictions imposed by your enemies.
Elan Recovery.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn.
